com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job

Class PrintJobsConnector

  • java.lang.Object

extends CallConnector
    A class that encapsulates interaction with Clover's print job queue.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public String print(Printer printer,
                    PrintJob printJob)
        Print a print job.
        Parameters:
        printer - a Printer, the print where the print job shall be printed.
        printJob - a PrintJob, the print job to print.
        Returns:
        a String, the print job ID.

      • getState

        public Integer getState(String printJobId)
        Get the state of a previously printed print job. Print jobs older than one hour are deleted regardless of their state. If the print job for the given ID has been deleted from the database, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        printJobId - a String, the print job ID.
        Returns:
        an int, the print job state or null if the print job does not exist.
        See Also:
        PrintJobsContract.STATE_IN_QUEUE, PrintJobsContract.STATE_PRINTING, PrintJobsContract.STATE_DONE, PrintJobsContract.STATE_ERROR

      • getPrintJobIds

        public List<String> getPrintJobIds(int state)
